column1: 18:04|Four minutes after six|"We will make record of it
column3: as this dear hour chimes from the clock
column4: we will celebrate it with thanksgivings
column5:
all the years of our life.

column9: my Rosannah..."""|The Loves of Alonzo Fitz Clarence and Rosannah Ethelton|Mark Twain
